item.title: By: Bruce
item.dc:creator: Bruce
item.description: There is an excel sheet that you can download that helps <a href="http://www.answerco.com/pages/amazon-fee-and-profit-calculator.aspx" rel="nofollow">calculate selling prices on Amazon's marketplace</a> by margin dollars or gross profit percentage.
item.content:encoded: There is an excel sheet that you can download that helps calculate selling prices on Amazon’s marketplace by margin dollars or gross profit percentage.

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich

item.description: Wow, looks neat. Thanks for sharing.

item.title: By: Bruce
item.dc:creator: Bruce
item.description: You can download an excel sheet that calulates your Amazon selling price by GP dollars or GP percentage with all the fees. Download the <a href="http://www.answerco.com/pages/amazon-fee-and-profit-calculator.aspx" rel="nofollow">Amazon Pricing Calculator Excel sheet</a>.
item.content:encoded: You can download an excel sheet that calulates your Amazon selling price by GP dollars or GP percentage with all the fees. Download the Amazon Pricing Calculator Excel sheet.
